DataElement.preferredName: Material Storage Administration Reuse Template Study Activity Name Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An administrative activity defined at a global library level that is an action of safekeeping harvested material in a repository or depository. EXAMPLE(S): refrigeration, cryopreservation, dehydration NOTE(S): There is a difference between the act of changing the state of material, which is represented here, and the act of maintaining state of the material by storing it. A coded value specifying the non-unique textual identifier for the activity. EXAMPLE(S): (1) CPT4 or SNOMED term for a surgical procedure. (2) Coded value for a single analytic procedure in a lab test. (3) The code and text of an individual question on the eligibility checklist of a protocol. NOTE(S): The textual description of the activity is captured in the complex data type.

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG 3.2 Release Note
ReferenceDocuments.description: Due to technical difficulties we are unable to correct a known error in the BRIDG model as loaded to caDSR. The association between DefinedMaterialStorage and Specimen is deprecated in BRIDG 3.2 and should not have been loaded to caDSR.

DataElement.changeDescription: Added BRIDG 3.2 Release Note as Association Reference Document. mc 5/15/13  Moved UML alt def to CDE preferred def and released per model owner approval. mc 6/2013
